source_entity: Serious Or Moderate Mental Illness Indicator
description: The indicator for Serious or Moderate Mental Illness (SMMI) is based on the 2012 predicted probability of SMI (SMIPPPY).

The predicted probability of SMI is compared to the specified cutoff point to determine the indicator value.
